description: REST API endpoint definitions with HTTP methods, parameters, and responses

input.natural_language: Define a GET endpoint to fetch user by ID

expected_output.quantum_code:
<q:function name="getUser" rest-endpoint="/api/users/{id}" rest-method="GET">
  <q:param name="id" type="string" required="true" />
  <q:return value="SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = {id}" />
</q:function>
expected_output.runtime_behavior: Creates GET /api/users/:id endpoint that fetches user from database

input.natural_language: Create POST endpoint to add new user

expected_output.quantum_code:
<q:function name="createUser" rest-endpoint="/api/users" rest-method="POST" validate-params="true">
  <q:param name="name" type="string" required="true" />
  <q:param name="email" type="string" required="true" />
  <q:param name="age" type="number" required="false" />
  <q:return value="INSERT INTO users (name, email, age) VALUES ({name}, {email}, {age})" />
</q:function>
expected_output.runtime_behavior: Creates POST /api/users endpoint that inserts new user into database

expected_output.quantum_code:
<q:function name="updateUser" rest-endpoint="/api/users/{id}" rest-method="PUT" validate-params="true">
  <q:param name="id" type="string" required="true" />
  <q:param name="name" type="string" required="false" />
  <q:param name="email" type="string" required="false" />
  <q:return value="UPDATE users SET name = {name}, email = {email} WHERE id = {id}" />
</q:function>
expected_output.runtime_behavior: Creates PUT /api/users/:id endpoint for user updates

expected_output.quantum_code:
<q:function name="deleteUser" rest-endpoint="/api/users/{id}" rest-method="DELETE">
  <q:param name="id" type="string" required="true" />
  <q:return value="DELETE FROM users WHERE id = {id}" />
</q:function>

<q:function name="searchUsers" rest-endpoint="/api/users/search" rest-method="GET">
  <q:param name="name" type="string" required="false" />
  <q:param name="minAge" type="number" required="false" />
  <q:param name="maxAge" type="number" required="false" />
  <q:return value="SELECT * FROM users WHERE (name LIKE '%{name}%' OR {name} IS NULL) AND (age >= {minAge} OR {minAge} IS NULL) AND (age <= {maxAge} OR {maxAge} IS NULL)" />
</q:function>

<q:function name="listUsers" rest-endpoint="/api/users" rest-method="GET" validate-params="true">
  <q:param name="page" type="number" required="false" default="1" />
  <q:param name="limit" type="number" required="false" default="10" min="1" max="100" />
  <q:return value="SELECT * FROM users LIMIT {limit} OFFSET {(page - 1) * limit}" />
</q:function>

input.natural_language: Get posts for a specific user

expected_output.quantum_code:
<q:function name="getUserPosts" rest-endpoint="/api/users/{userId}/posts" rest-method="GET">
  <q:param name="userId" type="string" required="true" />
  <q:return value="SELECT * FROM posts WHERE user_id = {userId}" />
</q:function>
expected_output.runtime_behavior: Creates GET /api/users/:userId/posts endpoint for nested resources
